instructions: Open the Google Images site in your browser. For Safari on iOS, tap on the aA button at the top-left. Choose Request Desktop Website from the menu. If you re using Chrome on iOS, tap the Share icon at the top-right of the screen and scroll down to Request Desktop Site in the list. For Chrome on Android, tap the three-dot Menu button at the top-right and check the Desktop site box. Tap the camera icon that appears on the page. Now you can choose to either upload an image or paste a URL, just like you would on your desktop.
